subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After a 43-13 loss to the Texans, the 5-2 Ravens will spend their bye week wondering why the offense that was supposed to carry them is flailing, particularly on the road.
snippet: After a 43-13 loss to the Texans, the 5-2 Ravens will spend their bye week wondering why the offense that was supposed to carry them is flailing, particularly on the road.
